radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple cystic areas of bone densification and ground glass density in both the lower limb long bones and skull, thinning of the bone cortex and deformation of the bilateral femoral shaft and cervical trunk angle.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperative alkaline phosphatase and osteocalcin levels decreased from 670 IU/L and 219.6 ng/ml to 403 IU/L and 246.3 ng/ml respectively between July 2010 and December 2013.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Radiographs following left femoral shaft fracture internal fixation
